analysis:
**1. The Core Claim(s):**
The claim states that Barack Obama is the current president of the United States of America.

**2. Evidence Breakdown:**
*   According to multiple sources, Donald Trump is the 47th and current president of the United States.
*   Donald Trump assumed office on January 20, 2025.
*   Barack Obama was the president before Donald Trump.

**3. Context & Nuance:**
Barack Obama's presidency ended before 2025. The current president is Donald Trump as of February 2026.

**4. Red Flags & Discrepancies:**
No major discrepancies found in the verified sources.

grounding_citations.title: President of the United States - Wikipedia
grounding_citations.snippet:
In addition, nine vice presidents have become president by virtue of a president's intra-term death or resignation. ... In all, 45 individuals have served, or are serving, 47 presidencies as of the current 60th four-year term. Donald Trump is the 47th and current president since January 20, 2025.
...

grounding_citations.title: Presidents, vice presidents, and first ladies - USAGov
grounding_citations.snippet:
(2025-09-17) The 47th and current president of the United States is Donald John Trump. He was sworn into office on January 20, 2025.
...

grounding_citations.title: Donald Trump - Wikipedia
grounding_citations.snippet: Donald John Trump (born June 14, 1946) is an American politician, media personality, and businessman who is the 47th president of the United States. A member of the Republican Party, he served as the 45th president from 2017 to 2021. ... Queens, New York City, U.S. ... Donald Jr.
